attributes.action: Stop the Construction of the Thames Super Sewer
attributes.additional_details:
Put a Stop to the construction of a new River Thames Super Sewer!

Construction will disrupt Londoner's lives and the cost of the Super Sewer will be paid for by Thames Water customers who will see significant rises in their water bills in 2014.

There is no clear evidence that this Super Sewer is needed, and other rain water collection methods have been suggested but rejected.
